description:
No.1 free driver updater. Automatically scan and update 9,500,000+ device drivers for a smoother PC

Driver Booster is free Windows software that scans your computer and updates over 6.5 million device drivers to improve performance. This software detects and installs newer versions of outdated, missing, or faulty drivers, and can also uninstall and reinstall problematic display drivers. The software includes a Game Boost feature to optimize your computer for better gaming and creates a restore point before making major updates.
v12.4 2025-04-08
-  Supported updating for more new devices, such as AMD Radeon RX 9000 Series, AMD Ryzen 9 Series CPU, and AMD Ryzen AI CPU
-  Supported updating more game drivers to improve game performance, including The First Berserker: Khazan, KARMA: The Dark World, Rise of the Ronin, Half-Life 2 RTX Demo, inZOI, Warhammer 40,000: Darktide, Assassin's Creed Shadows, The Last of Us Part II Remastered, and Control
-  Optimized Game Boost for a better gaming experience
-  Fixed known bugs
